name: kirby-webhooks
description: Kirby field plugin providing a trigger mechanism for webhooks - allows easy deploy triggers etc
author: Philip Jonas Ullrich

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o index.css ] -p bundle-collapser/plugin -e src/main.js > index.js
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o index.css ] -p bundle-collapser/plugin -e src/main.js | uglifyjs -c -m > index.js
